subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Tyler Farrar, a Garmin-Cervelo cyclist, won his first Tour de France stage on the Fourth of July, and dedicated the win to his former training partner Wouter Weylandt.
snippet: Tyler Farrar, a Garmin-Cervelo cyclist, won his first Tour de France stage on the Fourth of July, and dedicated the win to his former training partner Wouter Weylandt.
